events.message: The insured reported an auto accident involving their vehicle colliding with another car at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the car collision provided by the claimant.
An agent has been assigned to the claim to assist the claimant and to manage the investigation and resolution process.
The insurance company formally acknowledged the receipt of the claim and communicated next steps to the customer.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driverâ€™s license copy from the claimant to verify the details.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report and photos, providing comprehensive evidence of the accident.
Claim investigation initiated to assess damages and liability based on submitted documents and vehicle inspection report.
Completed detailed investigation confirming the liability of the other party and estimated repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
Proposed a fair settlement amount covering repair costs and rental car expenses during the repair period to the claimant.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the prompt and transparent handling.
The claim was approved after all verifications, allowing the disbursal of funds for vehicle repair and associated costs.
Payment was issued directly to the authorized repair shop to cover the repair costs as agreed upon in the settlement.
Claim has been successfully closed after completion of repairs and full settlement payment to the claimant.
All claim records and documentation have been archived safely for future reference and compliance requirements.
